titleStmt.title: The mysterie of Christes natiuitie A sermon preached in the parish church of All-Saints in Dorchester, within the countie of Dorset, the 25. day of December 1613. being Christmas Daye. By William Iones, Master of Arts, and preacher of Gods Word.
titleStmt.author: Jones, William, b. 1581 or 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Stansby] for Richard Hawkins, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery-lane, neere Seriants Inne,
